actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce.

official_title: A bill to require the Secretary of Transportation to conduct a study of discharges of oil and hazardous substances into the waters of New York Harbor, the Delaware River, and adjoining waters.
subjects: Oil pollution of rivers, harbors, etc.

summary.text: Requires the Secretary of Transportation to conduct a study of discharges of oil and hazardous substances into the waters of New York Harbor, the Delaware River, and adjoining waters. Requires the Secretary to submit a final report on the study to the Congress.

titles.title: A bill to require the Secretary of Transportation to conduct a study of discharges of oil and hazardous substances into the waters of New York Harbor, the Delaware River, and adjoining waters.
